constituent: bell, metal, gold, juvenile, vase, stand up, computer
heisigStory: This bell is made of cheap metal, and so badly made that when you ring it, it lets out a noise like the "bellowing" of juveniles who aren't getting their own way.
koohiiStory1: The METAL bell rings to call the JUVENILES to class.
koohiiStory2: The METAL bell rings to call the JUVENILES to COMPUTER class.
myStory: chuông. vàng trẻ chưa đủ tuổi dùng để làm chuông
words:
釣鐘(つりがね): hanging bell
鐘(かね): bell, chime
